mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, name, description, definition, status, created_at, updated_at FROM workflow WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO workflow (user_id, name, description, definition, status, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{name}, #{description}, #{definition}, #{status}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE workflow SET name = #{name}, description = #{description}, definition = #{definition}, status = #{status}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId}
